text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: C'mon Bourbon. As I'm sure yanoticed, this park's scary for real,not just for kids.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I have noticed. I collected a<n>testimonial suggesting that
this park<n>inspired last year's party committee,<n>so I have
updated the tasklist to<n>include researching it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However, it was unclear who should<n>perform the task, as it
was not listed<n>in the original plans. Hence, as chief<n>of the
party committee, I must attend<n>to it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Again?! Is that all you can say?!<n>"Task this," "task that"!

text_block_list.name: Park Staff
text_block_list.text:
Hey there, how about a group photo?<n>Squeeze in, smile, and
you'll be best<n>friends again in a flash!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Oh! Y-yes, please! Everyone, gather<n>round!

text_block_list.name: Park Staff
text_block_list.text: Here we go! Say "cheeeese"!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, this will make such a lovely<n>souvenir. Tamtam,
Bourbon, Rice, Rob<n>Roy, and me...

text_block_list.name: Park Staff
text_block_list.text: Yep, you six look great!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Six?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I see. The inclusion of a "ghost"<n>makes commemorative
photos scary.<n>A photo area in a fixed, riggable<n>location...
We could use that technique<n>at our party.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...No more!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice?! Riiice!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Th-this ride's brand new this year!<n>Isn't it nice to sit down
and chat as<n>we go along?

LOveMelOVemeLOveMEloVemELovEmeL<n>
oVEmELoveMEloVeMeLO<n>VEmeLoVemE.

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaah?! Bwaaaack?!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Interesting. By restricting the ability<n>to flee, you can impose
a greater<n>sense of terror.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
All right, how's everyone doing?<n>Anyone need a break? I
have drinks,<n>but no chugging them, okay?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Sigh... The next spot, for sure! I'llset up a chance for Rice to talk withBourbon...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy, is everything okay?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, um, I'm fine... Let's go to<n>that haunted house
next!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Request: processed.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
"None shall escape this manor. The<n>exit is veiled in shadow,
and the card<n>key is shrouded in mystery."

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...We've been locked in.

text_block_list.name: Rob Roy & Rice
text_block_list.text: Eeeeek!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Adding new entry to task list: solve<n>mystery and locate
exit.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hold the phone, were ya listening?<n>He said "card key." We
can't have ya<n>fryin' our only way out!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Just leave the<n>electromagneto-whatever stuff to me.<n>I'll
get us outta here in no time.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I decline. By current assessment, you<n>are not responsible
for our current<n>predicament. In the event of<n>unexpected
errors, the committee<n>chief is first in line to respond.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Aaagh, not the "I'll do everything<n>alone" speech again!
Look, ya don't<n>gotta tough it out—

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
If I may, I'd say that escaping the<n>haunted house is a
mission for all five<n>of us.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I know! How about we split up the<n>tasks? Rice, Bourbon,
and I can<n>search the room on the right.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Meanwhile, Tamtam and Rob Roy can<n>investigate the room
on the left. That<n>way, we're bound to escape twice as<n>
fast!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Optimal workflow settings, updated.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Looks like this room's got a number<n>lock. I bet the combo's
hidden<n>somewhere in the other room, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Know what? I'm gonna go check up<n>on how Team
Bourbon's doing. Ya<n>comin' with, Rob Roy?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Oh, no... I'll stay.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Oh, okay.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Rob Roy? From what I've seen,<n>horror's not your
forte. Why'd ya<n>come out to a spooky place like this?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I just... you know, um...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I wanted to give Rice a chance to<n>speak with Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Rice? I gave her a chance myself, and<n>all they talked about
was the weather.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Yes, but I'm sure there's something<n>more—she just hasn't
worked up the<n>courage to say it yet.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I saw an article about this park's<n>Halloween event and how
letting<n>loose here can bring people together.<n>I figured it'd
be a good place for Rice<n>to share her inner thoughts.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
But here we are, and I still haven't<n>managed to set the
mood...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Gotcha. I'll get 'em talkin', so don't<n>you worry.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You stay put here, then. I'll let 'em<n>know you were thinkin'
about 'em.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Tamtam. I had a feeling you'd<n>show up. But I'm afraid
you're not<n>getting past me. ♪

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What?
